Gisborne fishing boat rescue: Urgent efforts to save two men https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/06/25/gisborne-fishing-boat-rescue-urgent-efforts-to-save-two-men/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/06/25/gisborne-fishing-boat-rescue-urgent-efforts-to-save-two-men/ Murray RobertsonUrgent efforts made by sea and air in atrocious conditions Tue, 25 Jun 2024 05:22:07 +0000 The missing fishing boat with three men onboard had headed to Māhia Peninsula (off Portland Island,pictured) to fish for bluefin on Monday. It was not heard from since and yesterday a bulk carrier spotted two men in the water off the peninsula and a rescue mission was launched.
